remarks: Restricted existential specialization, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by FL, 17-Apr-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
statement:
rspcdv.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. B ) $.
rspcdv.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
rspcedv $p |- ( ph -> ( ch -> E. x e. B ps ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x $.
